Summary: Spinning, Multi-colored Flashing lights, zig zagging then disappearing into sky behind hills
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving home in dark on Hwy 280 going northbound in Palo Alto, CA after the Alpine Rd. exit. Saw spinning, multi-colored flashing lights, zig zagging then disappearing into sky behind hills. At first thought it was police car driving with lights flashing high up on a windy hill within view. Then it started spinning with rainbow colors, and we noticed it was up in the sky. Went from red-blue-white-purple-turquoise-yellow-orange-red. We were shocked and wondered if perhaps the lights were LED's because they were so bright. We have seen several UFO's but nothing this spectacular. We watched it for about 2 minutes. I was driving at the time, so I had to look away, but my boyfriend was able to capture a cellphone video of it for only a split second before it disappeared. We got home and searched "rainbow ufo" and found many similar videos to what we saw on Youtube. I am trying to email the video to myself right now, it is taking too long to load. If anyone is interested we can send it.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Palo Alto
There were no other sightings in Palo Alto on or around October 22nd 2013
